channel.title: CVE Feed for WECON -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WECON -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-23157|2024-09-17T03:59:53.024Z -- wecon -- levistudiou
item.description: WECON LeviStudioU Versions 2019-09-21 and prior are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute code.

item.title: CVE-2021-43983|2024-09-17T01:26:17.068Z -- wecon -- levistudiou
item.description: WECON LeviStudioU Versions 2019-09-21 and prior are vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflow instances while parsing project files, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2018-17889|2024-09-17T00:15:34.493Z -- wecon -- pi%20studio%20hmi
item.description: In WECON Technology Co., Ltd. PI Studio HMI versions 4.1.9 and prior and PI Studio versions 4.2.34 and prior when parsing project files, the XMLParser that ships with Wecon PIStudio is vulnerable to a XML external entity injection attack, which may allow sensitive information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2018-14818|2024-09-17T02:37:32.231Z -- wecon -- pi%20studio%20hmi
item.description: WECON Technology Co., Ltd. PI Studio HMI versions 4.1.9 and prior and PI Studio versions 4.2.34 and prior have a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability which may allow remote code execution.
